entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
